mapper.select: select * from business where username like #{username} and password like #{password} and state != '待审核'
mapper.insert: insert into business (userName,password,name,address,type,registeredCapital,logPicture,balance,state) select #{userName},#{password},#{name},#{address},#{type},#{registeredCapital},#{logPicture},#{registeredCapital},'待审核' where not exists (select * from business where userName = #{userName})
mapper.update: update business set balance = (balance + #{price}) where id = #{businessId}
